Desc.eng: The Resistance is taking back the streets of Borgova! Isn’t that marvelous? All those brave soldiers shedding their sweet… delicious… spicy blood for their city!
And what are you going to do? Give advice from the dangerous depths of your armchair?
Ach, you know me too well, my lady. Coordination and strategic planning! It’s a difficult burden, but someone has to do it.
Your determination is remarkable. If you need me, I’ll be outside, fighting a real battle.
